comments.content: It looks very close to **[Freestyle Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20141027051101/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset&ffam=FreestyleScript%20LT%20-%20Regular&fid=15a44fe4bdc2cb5d6f7a297ad3369f7a&fsize=60&text=infinity&fit=1)** by Martin Wait [1986]
